file_content.text: Thermal scans indicate we're rising to the stratosphere. I've never been so high up!
This place... is my destiny?
Encouragement: Continue.
Destiny? Do tell.
A Scion I served with had a vision: me, riding a star-ladder with a metal assassin. Together, we would face my greatest test.
How dramatic! Did your friend say what the test was?
No. I killed him right after he said that. Emperor Arcann's orders.
Agreement: Sounds promising.
It does match our situation in an oddly specific manner.
Musing: Meatbags and destiny.
The organic preoccupation with fate is peculiar. You have the freedom to do anything, but you wish to follow a set program.
A droid cannot understand what it means to have a greater purpose.
All my life has led to this moment. I am ready for the test.
Argh!
Maker's data!
Do you think she passed her test?
According to my sensors... nnno.
Oh, well. Shall we move on?
Query: Do you ever shut up?
Your prattling has permanently damaged my attention processor.
Concern: She's gone crazy, Z0.
The meatbag has lost her mind.
Sarcasm: Oh, good, a story.
I could ask you to clarify... but I won't.
What a journey. From the bottom of the sea to the end of the sky...
Agreement: Well put.
That was eloquent, Zeeyo.
Retort: I'm ready for the end.
Let us pray to the Maker it's over soon.
This view... it's almost familiar, like a fragmented image file in my databanks...
Encouragement: A memory?
That may be exactly what it is. Do you remember anything else?
Query: Can I transmit?
Are we close to escaping the hyperwave beacon scrambler field?
The signal-dampening zone terminates above us. Exact range: unknown.
Greetings, droidfellow! I am Zeeyo Ohm. I'm new here. Are we friends?
Lament: Ugh.
Here we go again...
I... need time to process all that.
Process away. Just keep moving.
Resignation: I suppose.
Yes. Unfortunately. Where to begin...
Denial: Certainly not.
No. Let me tell you why...
Sarcasm: Good for you.
Excellent. Now recall an image of the proper escape route.
You can't understand. You're only a machine.
I'm certain this is the fate he saw.
I wish I could. That would be helpful, wouldn't it?
Thanks! Not bad for my first activation, right?
I want to hear more!
Why? We only just started!
Correction: No, we have not. I will explain...
Revelation: About that...
Complaint: I can't transmit.
Yet I still can't escape the hyperwave beacon scrambler.
Oh, is that what I'm detecting? How strange! Who would do something like that?
Declaration: I shall bring you up to speed...
